website_summaries.verdict: A high quality duffel style bag with a compartment for everything – even your sunglasses.
pros: The main compartment is completely waterproof, keeping your items dry
We love the number of dividers and pockets in this bag
Easy to keep everything organized for quick access
We especially love the protective sunglasses pocket
cons: Zipper pulls susceptible to coming untied and falling off

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Heavy Duty Blind Bag at the Right Price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty, well made blind bag. I like that it has dividers that you can configure to meet your needs. The dividers keep things from shifting around. Just the right number of pockets. Waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: SpartanA2

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Blind Bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Can’t wait to use it for this years’ waterfowl season. I hunt with my brother almost every time we go out, so having a bag to carry both of our shells, licenses, gloves etc. is why the deluxe bag is perfect. Strong straps!! Other blind bags have weak straps, break every time. Really like the waterproof clear pocket on top...perfect for phone, hunting regs, lighters. Would definitely recommend this blind bag to any avid waterfowler!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to water proof
customer_reviews.text: It a nice bag and its comfortable to carry around the swamp. The thing is not even close to waterproof. It does float, but after a couple min the water comes in and keeps coming in. Works ok in the canoe when theres a little water, but if you set it on the cattails partially on water your screwed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Was thinking the front pockets would hold a box of shells but I was mistaken. Should have ordered the larger size, my fault. More than enough pockets to store and organize whatever you need. I will say that the pack is water resistant and not completely waterproof. Seems to be a well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Gram

customer_reviews.title: Great product worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag, use it all the time and has perfect amount of storage. The bag floats with it fully loaded down with gear and shells. The only thing i wish it had was a metal instead of plastic clip to close the top lid.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob L McMillen

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the price for this quality of blind bag.
customer_reviews.text: This bag has yet to be field tested, but I am already very pleased. More useful pockets than I know what to do with, wait, I'll just buy more gear.. very nice, heavy duty zippers, Velcro, and straps. I will be using this as a blind/kayak hunting bag for sure. No I won't care if it gets wet because I know everything inside will stay dry.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Finally Organized!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of walking out into the field with my pockets stuffed with "stuff". I'm organized now and everything is in one place. Roomy with lots of pockets to carry all your items.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Bones

customer_reviews.title: A duck hunters tool
customer_reviews.text: Our son is a big duck hunter and did not really have a good bag to haul all of his hunting things from the truck to the blind. This bag holds his shells, extra socks, gloves and the other things he takes with him.
customer_reviews.author: Hawgfan

customer_reviews.title: I really like this blind bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this blind bag. Some of the smaller outer pockets are almost too small, but they are functional and make the bag look really nice. The courtesy light is neat touch, also love having a dedicated sunglasses pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Quality bag
customer_reviews.text: I use the bag for water fowl hunting. Holds everything I need with room or more. It is very high quality. Would recommend to anyone. I plan to use it as a camera bag in the off season.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Looks nice and holds everything I need for a morning in the pit. Never leave home without it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great camera bag.
customer_reviews.text: My new camera bag. If it floats, it will keep the rain out. The camouflage matches everything that I have and the dividers keep the lenses and body apart. Many pockets for accessories. All weather construction for the Pacific Northwest. It was made for duck hunters, to keep their shotgun shells dry, but it works great as a camera bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Brockschmidt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and plenty of storage room
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of duck and goose hunting and it is the perfect size to Kari three or four boxes of shells headlamp sunglasses some snacks, the dividers inside are all removable I would definitely recommend it for the Avid Hunter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great carryon bag for a man
customer_reviews.text: Dad loved it. He uses for his toiletry bag and carry on for the airplane. Has a place for sunglasses, water bottle and all of his things.
customer_reviews.author: Redfringe

customer_reviews.title: Blind Bag
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It holds 6 boxes of shells, binnoculars, calls, and a few drinks. The strap is comfortable to carry. It brings your needed supplies and a few extras into the marsh. unfortanetly doesnt bring the ducks with it. Very satisfied thus far. I have only carried it for a few hunts so far. Looking forward to many years of use with this blind bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t like to float
customer_reviews.text: Does not like to float with stuff in it and fill the side pockets up with water every time I use it
customer_reviews.author: anders taylor

customer_reviews.title: Next level duck hunting!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the gift that keeps on giving. A bag that he didn’t know he needed but has become a necessity, this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cb1913

customer_reviews.title: So excited to use this bag this year.
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to break this bag out this season. I got it a couple months ago because I couldn't wait. Quality bag and good buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Blind Bag
customer_reviews.text: Fits several boxes of ammo, keeps sunglasses safe, everything stayed dry in the rain, heavier coat fit in drawstring on top. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Samuel E. Ziemba

customer_reviews.title: Very nice blind bag
customer_reviews.text: Very nice blind bag. It’s a little larger than I expected. Has several pouches for storage. Easily carry 100 shells plus other stuff in the main compartment
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag. Great size as far as larger bags ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. Great size as far as larger bags go. Exterior pockets are a nice touch however the zipper loops are not very durable, broke one the first day I went huntin with it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Never been so organized in the blind before. This ...
customer_reviews.text: Never been so organized in the blind before. This is a solid bag. And it floats keeping inside dry, had a trip to a blind that use to be thigh high water, this year was chest high, kept my shells and snacks dry.
customer_reviews.author: tmarko

customer_reviews.title: Everything I Expected and More!
customer_reviews.text: The deluxe floating blind bag is by far the best bag I have owned over the last 10 years. Not only is it well-constructed and comfortable to carry, but it has all the organizational features I was looking for including: adjustable internal dividers, clear cell phone pouch, thermos sleeve/pocket, and dedicated sunglasses case. On top of all that, it is truly waterproof (unlike some of the other brand name bags I have previously owned). Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the money. It can be used as a cooler as well lol!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My husbands hunting buddies all want one, too! He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa H

customer_reviews.title: Well built.
customer_reviews.text: Main compartment kept my gear dry while floating for 4 hours during a hunt. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth F.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag with a lot of storage. Could not give a 5 Star as glass holder would not zip all the way shut, but not worth exchanging.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for duck hunting haven’t used it yet but I am impressed with the quality and price and all the storage it has! Can’t wait to use it! A lot of bag for the money
customer_reviews.author: Michael g.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blind bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room and pockets for all of my gear. Has held up well through the first season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good bag. Zippers are not the best. Broke one the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Donnahoe

customer_reviews.title: Room for Everything
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag well made, I will say it can be overkill if you fill it up too much so be ware.
customer_reviews.author: AboutTime

customer_reviews.title: Bought the XL
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! The seller contacted me to make sure the product was good. My husband is in love!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: It truly floats!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for grandson who is avid duck hunter and it was perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: SuzyRev

customer_reviews.title: Husband LOVED it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my Husband to take duck hunting. He really, really likes it!
customer_reviews.author: R.J.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Lots of pockets for all the things you need in a blind.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Garrett

customer_reviews.title: The bag is awesome. I got the large
customer_reviews.text: The bag is awesome. I got the large. Good size would recommend it. Unfortunately mine did not come with the shoulder strap. Sweet bag tho
customer_reviews.author: CP360

customer_reviews.title: Great blind bag
customer_reviews.text: Great blind bag, lots of storage compartments. The dividers inside the bag put it over the top, no more fishing for gear all mixed up in the bag, it's right where you put it.
customer_reviews.author: DRob

customer_reviews.title: Get the bigger bag for sure
customer_reviews.text: The bag is way smaller than it looks in the pictures
customer_reviews.author: katie123

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected and advertised I can't wait to put it to the test.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have now taken this bag hunting with me 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: I have now taken this bag hunting with me 6 times and it has been more than I could have expected. The various compartments and protective areas holds more gear than I previously had and it allows me to keep all of my duck hunting items in a single bag. I have not had an issue with water (it sits in the bottom of the boat). I'm debating on getting another one to hold my deer hunting items.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Very small. Not what is shown
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small bag, especially for $60. I was expecting something big enough to put more than my calls, a pair of gloves and maybe a water bottle in. Unless they shipped the wrong one this thing is not much bigger than a lunch box. I will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Martin

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect size bad for my gear for waterfowl hunting
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size bad for my gear for waterfowl hunting! Love all aspects of it and the color scheme is perfect as well and doesn't need much of any concealment when out hunting depending on your environment. I hunt in a loot of cat tails and brush and this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gross

customer_reviews.title: The bag came quickly and looked nice. However the dividers were not removeable (as stated ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag came quickly and looked nice. However the dividers were not removeable (as stated in the description and on the tag of the bag when it came) so my husband wasn't able to fit a lot of things he needed in the compartments. We sent it back but were still required to pay for the return shipping!! If a product is not as described doesn't it mean that the product is defective and the company should pay for shipping!?!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Richey

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing and easy to carry all my gear now plus plenty of storage.
customer_reviews.author: justin lloyd

product_meta.title: ALPS OutdoorZ Delta Waterfowl Floating Deluxe Blind Bag
product_meta.description: The waterproof sealed membrane on the main compartment guarantees that the gear you bring to the field will stay dry while you’re hunting. The bag is constructed of non-absorbing closed cell foam, which ensures that it won’t soak up any water. The Floating Deluxe Blind Bag has been designed with an array of convenient features, such as a removable LED light, removable interior dividers, a clear valuables pocket for your cell phone and other accessories, and a hard sunglasses case. The bag also includes a multitude of pockets to give you countless organization options, as well as a thermos & jacket sleeve on the top. The Floating Deluxe Blind Bag also features a padded carry handle and shoulder strap to make transporting your gear stress-free. Available in two sizes: Standard (12"x9"x8") and Large (14"x11"x9")
feature_bullets: Countless organization pockets to store your gear, including a hard outer shell sunglass case
Made with non-absorbing closed cell foam to protect from water entrance
Waterproof sealed membrane for large main compartment
Jacket sleeve on top, thermos pocket on side, carry handle and padded shoulder strap
Dimensions: 12" W x 9" D x 8" H, Weight: 2 lbs. 8 oz.; Camo Pattern: Realtree MAX-5
